categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Fixer 308 was a Human female who served in the Imperial Intelligence of the resurgent Sith Empire during the Cold War. Around 3642 BBY she was stationed on Hoth at the Frostwake Outpost in the Starship Graveyard. She devised a plan to cripple the White Maw pirates once and for all by attacking a meeting of their leaders, a plan that a fellow Imperial carried out.
